```{r echo FALSE}
expoData<-function(filename="jan 19 2018.csv")
  {
    data <- read.csv(filename, header= T);
    CO2 <- data$CO2[!is.na(data$CO2)]
    u <- data$u[!is.na(data$u)] 
    v <- data$v[!is.na(data$v)] 
    w <- data$u[!is.na(data$u)] 
    airtemp <- data$airtemp[!is.na(data$airtemp)] 
    n = length(CO2)
    
    t <-(seq(0,86400, length.out=n))/3600
    matplot(t,  cbind(u,v,w), ylab = "wind", xlab="time(hours)", type="s",
            col=c("red","blue","green"))
    axis(1, at = seq(from=0, to=24, by= 4))
    legend("topright", c("u","v","w"), col=c("red","blue","green"), bg="gray93", lwd=1)
    
    plot(t, CO2, ylab = "umol CO2 umol-1", xlab="time(hours))",type="s")
    axis(1, at = seq(from=0, to=24, by= 4))
    
    plot(t, airtemp, ylab = "Temperature (C)", xlab="time(hours))",type="s")
    axis(1, at = seq(from=0, to=24, by= 4))
  }
expoData()
```
